item.title: Policy Gradients in a NutShell
item.description: Introduction Reinforcement Learning (RL) refers to both the learning problem and the sub-field of machine learning which has lately been in the news for great reasons.

item.title: A Deep Reinforcement Learning approach to Robot Grasping
item.description: Paper details Under Review in Robotics adn Autonomous Systems (RAS), Elsevier Journals

item.title: Augmented Random Search for quadcopter control : An alternative to reinforcement learning
item.description: Paper details Model-based reinforcement learning strategies are believed to exhibit more significant sample complexity than model-free strategies to control dynamical systems,such as quadcopters.

item.title: New Fusion Algorithm provides an alternative approach for Robotic path planning
item.description: Paper details For rapid growth in technology and automation, human tasks are being taken over by robots as robots have proven to be better with both speed and precision.

item.title: LeCORe : A Framework for modelling Learner's preference
item.description: Paper details Presented at 11th International Conference on Educational Data Mining , Buffalo, New York, US, 2018.

item.title: Learning semantic Image attributes using Image recognition and knowledge Graph embeddings
item.description: Paper details Accepted at Future Technologies Conference (FTC) 2020 , Vancouver, Canada

item.title: Map the Robot World using SLAM and RTAB-MAP
item.description: Project Heads-up SLAM(Simultaneous Localization and mapping) (Nvidia Article here) is a technology where a robot builds a map representing its spatial environment while keeping a track of its position within the built map.

item.title: PR2-Robot 3D Perception and Control
item.description: Project Heads-up This project gives the PR2 robot the ability to locate an object in a cluttered environment, pick it up and then move it to some other location.

item.title: Reinforcement Learning-Birds View
item.description: Deep Reinforcement Learning is the combination of Reinforcement Learning and Deep Learning and it is also the most trending type of Machine Learning at this moment because it is being able to solve a wide range of complex decision-making tasks that were previously out of reach for a machine to solve real-world problems with human-like intelligence.

item.title: Image Segmentation using PCL
item.description: Project Heads-up The project creates a ROS Node for image segmentation for objects kept on the cluttered table from the pcd's used in the RANSAC plane fitting project above.

item.title: Introduction to Open Gym AI
item.description: Understand the basic goto concepts to get a quick start on reinforcement learning and learn to test your algorithms with OpenAI gym to achieve research centric reproducible results.

item.title: Follow me-Quadrocopter Simulation
item.description: Project Heads-up A deep neural network to identify and track a target (person) via a simulated Quadrocopter (Simulated using Udacity QuadSim by Unity).

item.title: Training Locomotion using Augmented Random Search
item.description: Project Heads-up The project aims on building a new type of Artificial intelligence algorithm which is simple and surpasses many already available algorithms for Humanoid or Mu-Jo-Co(Multidimensionla-Joint-with-contact) locomotion related tasks.

item.title: Ant PyBullet Environment using Soft Actor Critic (SAC)
item.description: Project Heads-up Solving the environment by usage of the Soft Actor Critic algorithm, see the summary of the basic paper here

item.title: Cartpole Environment using REINFORCE
item.description: Project Heads-up REINFORCE algorithm is based on finding the local maximum of a function using a procedure known as gradient ascent.

item.title: Lunar Lander Environment using DDPG
item.description: Project Heads-up Solving the environment require an average total reward of over 200 on 100 consecutive episodes.

item.title: Motion Detector Using OpenCV
item.description: Project Heads-up Python/OpenCV script that detect motion on webcam and allow record it to a file and plot a graph for proper Visualization.

item.title: Rover perception and Control
item.description: Project Heads-up This project uses essential elements of Robotics, perception, decision making and Actuation to drive a rover Autonomously.

item.title: Unity Banana Environment using Deep Q-network (DQN)
item.description: Project Heads-up The agent is trained to navigate (and collect bananas!

item.title: Unity Crawler Environment using Proximal Policy Optimization (PPO)
item.description: Project Heads-up The Crawler environment. A creature with 4 arms and 4 forearms.

item.title: Unity Tennis Environment using Multi-agent DDPG
item.description: Project Heads-up The projetc uses the Tennis environment, where two agents control rackets to bounce ball over a net.

item.title: RANSAC plane fitting using PCL
item.description: Project Heads-up This project uses the Point Cloud Library (PCL). PCL is open project for 2D/3D image and point cloud processing.
